TopicTitle: Jebediah teaches us how to dock with a Space Station!

Articles.Content:
I've seen plenty of tutorials... but no-one has let the Kerbals show us how!

http://youtu.be/htM_4f4utR8

That was awesome, and hilarious.

The creator should do more tutorials as Jebediah. I really wanna know how they got Kerbspeak to work.
That 'Kerbspeak' is the Chatterer mod - it adds radio traffic for atmosphere.

That 'Kerbspeak' is the Chatterer mod - it adds radio traffic for atmosphere.

And here's the link: www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/chatterer/

It doesn't do much, but as Pecan said, it definitely adds to the atmosphere! When you're sending drone's out, it add's beeps and is pretty AWESOME.. and kind of eerie!

Loved the video.

Interesting way of doing tutorials. Downloading chatterer now too.

Keep it up.
Great job, I really enjoyed the video. What did you use for your "missiles," I didn't see anything attached to the craft.

I've seen plenty of tutorials... but no-one has let the Kerbals show us how!

That's not quite correct. Please see my signature.
If you look at the 4 symmetrical sticky out bits... 2 have missiles, two have just nose cones...

That's not quite correct. Please see my signature.

So they're actual plug-ins for the game??
